PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-04382018-04-20,  ,  HC,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations and the Regulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (DIN Requirements for Drugs Listed in Schedule C to the Food and Drugs Act that are in Dosage Form)
PrecisRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations and the Regulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (DIN Requirements for Drugs Listed in Schedule C to the Food and Drugs Act that are in Dosage Form) in order to (1) support the coming into force of the new powers to require assessments, tests and studies included in Vanessaâ€™s Law by establishing the rules needed to structure the exercise of those powers; (2) support post-market drug safety by creating new foreign incident reporting rules; (3) reduce unnecessary requirements by removing an New Drub Submission obligation; and (4) enable the Department to regulate drugs more efficiently and effectively, based on a life cycle approach.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0084 Publication Date: 2018-05-02
AttachmentsAttachment
